hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Saria's Song# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #0# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Deku Tree#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Pocket Cucco#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Death Mountain Trail#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #0# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Epona's Song#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Lobby Basement Upper

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the path to Termina is a one-way trip.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Saria).text: I wanna be a rocketship, @! Please help me live my dreams!

ToT (Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
